means: （使）保持， （使）继续（ keep的过去式和过去分词 ）

sentence.Network_en: A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
The plane has been kept in service far longer than originally intended.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架飞机已经超期服役很长时间了。

sentence.Network_en: He kept encouraging Rosie to find a place of her own.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不断鼓励罗茜为自己找个住处。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 过去式_百度百科 ... （生长）- -grew, （保持）- -kept, （知道，认识）- -knew.
八年级不规则动词_百度文库 ... keep 保持，保存 kept 保持，保存（过去式） know 知道，了解.
they kept improving their technical skill ., 他们不断地提高他们的技术水平.
Economic returns have further improved. National revenue has kept growing ., 经济效益进一步提高 , 财政收入不断增长.

list.abs: 高一英语题（关于动词词组）_百度知道 ... kept away 防范 kept back 落在后面, 阻止, 隐瞒, 留下 kept off 让开, 不接近.
now I kept wishing he'd sit up , smile and say , " Psych . " But he didn't .现在我一直祈祷他能坐起来，微笑着说：“吓坏了吧。”可是他没有。
英文潮起来~~_English Corner_派派小说 ... 小白脸，吃软饭的： kept man 二奶： kept woman 新新人类： new-new generation.
英文潮起来~~_English Corner_派派小说 ... 家庭主男： house-husband 小白脸，吃软饭的： kept man 二奶： kept woman.

entry.def: Kept is the past tense and past participle of keep.

means.word_mean: 1. (especially of promises or contracts) not violated or disregarded;

auth_sentence.content: The animal was kept at Hobart Zoo in Tasmania.
auth_sentence.res_content: The animal was kept at Hobart Zoo in Tasmania.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The animal was kept at Hobart Zoo in Tasmania.

auth_sentence.content: I kept sleep schedules and 'sleep hygiene' diaries.
auth_sentence.res_content: I kept sleep schedules and 'sleep hygiene' diaries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I kept sleep schedules and 'sleep hygiene' diaries.

auth_sentence.content: In most parks, grass is kept nicely mowed.
auth_sentence.res_content: In most parks, grass is kept nicely mowed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In most parks, grass is kept nicely mowed.

Sentence.sentence: The high cost of steam and the lesser need for speed kept the majority of the world's ocean freight moving by sail until the early years of the 20th century.
Since then, Toebe said, she has kept her promise to herself to cut back on her Internet use.
I only heard about the delay yesterday because we kept the production line clear to handle these special sheets.
Well, first of all, he kept the two dolphins together in the same tank and taught them to press levers whenever they saw a light.
If the light was kept steady, the dolphins were supposed to press the levers in reverse order
